amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the display of Confederate battle flags in national cemeteries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement section 8(d)(2) of the Department of Veterans Affairs National Cemetery Administration Directive 3220 of November 22, 2005.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 265 - 159, 1 Present (Roll no. 223).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 265 - 159, 1 Present (Roll no. 223).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Huffman.
